excursions.name: Sailing in Greece
excursions.description: Join us for an adventure through the breathtaking natural beauty of Greece. We will hike through majestic mountains, raft down wild rivers, and discover hidden waterfalls and forests.

excursions.name: Passage to Iceland
excursions.description: Join us on a long passage to Iceland. We will stop by on Faroe Islands. Prepare for cold, epic views and many waterfalls

excursions.name: Excursion in Japan
excursions.description: Join us for a culinary adventure through the flavors of Japan. We will visit local markets, learn to cook traditional dishes, and taste the best food and drink that the region has to offer.

excursions.name: Visiting Thailand
excursions.description: Join us for a culinary adventure through the flavors of Thailand. We will visit local markets, learn to cook traditional dishes, and taste the best food and drink that the region has to offer.

excursions.name: Vacation in Italy
excursions.description: Escape the hustle and bustle of everyday life on this relaxing excursion to Italy. We will stay in comfortable villas, enjoy delicious local cuisine, and spend our days exploring beautiful beaches, forests, and mountains.

excursions.name: Atlantic Crossing
excursions.description: Tick the next box of your bucket list and join us on a three week long Atlatic Crossing. The passage will be hard bu very rewarding. We will sail on a comfortable 60ft ocean-prepared slup

excursions.name: North West Passage
excursions.description: Step onboard our aluminum hull expedition yacht and conquer the North-West Passage, the hardest sailing route on planet earth. Sail the same path as Shackleton and Franklin tackling cold and ice

excursions.name: Iceland Trip
excursions.description: Experience the rich history and vibrant present of Iceland on this cultural excursion. We will visit ancient ruins, learn about traditional customs and crafts, and meet local people who will share their stories and traditions with us.

excursions.name: Iceland Loop
excursions.description: Drive around the iceland living in offroad camper truck. See places that others cannot and experience nordic nights in the middle of wild Iceland

excursions.name: Excursion to Italy
excursions.description: Experience the rich history and vibrant present of Italy on this cultural excursion. We will visit ancient ruins, learn about traditional customs and crafts, and meet local people who will share their stories and traditions with us.

details.review: I had a great time sailing in Greece! The views were breathtaking and the crew was friendly and knowledgeable. I would definitely recommend this excursion to anyone visiting the area.

I recently went Sailing in Greece and it was an amazing experience. The water was crystal clear and the marine life was so colorful and diverse. The guides were knowledgeable and made the experience even more enjoyable. I would highly recommend this excursion to anyone who loves the ocean and wants to experience its beauty up close.

I recently went Sailing in Greece and it was an amazing experience. The countryside was beautiful and the local people were so friendly and welcoming. The biking was challenging at times, but the sense of accomplishment after completing each day's ride was worth it. I would highly recommend this excursion to anyone who loves biking and wants to experience a different culture.

I recently went on Passage to Iceland and it was an amazing experience. The wineries we visited were beautiful and the wine was delicious. I would highly recommend this excursion to anyone who loves wine and wants to learn more about the process of making it.

My family and I had the opportunity to go on Excursion in Japan and it was a trip of a lifetime. We saw so many amazing animals in their natural habitat and the guides were knowledgeable and helped make the experience even more special. I would highly recommend this excursion to anyone looking to experience the beauty of Africa.

I recently went on a hiking trip in Thailand and it was one of the most beautiful and challenging experiences of my life. The views from the top of the mountain were breathtaking and the feeling of accomplishment after reaching the summit was unbeatable. I would highly recommend this excursion to anyone who loves the outdoors and a good challenge.

I had an amazing time skiing in Italy! The slopes were well-maintained and there was a good variety for skiers of all levels. The après-ski scene was also great, with plenty of options for dining and entertainment. I would definitely recommend this excursion to anyone looking for a fun and luxurious ski vacation.

details.excursionName: Scuba Diving in the Great Barrier Reef
details.review: I recently went Atlantic Crossing and it was an incredible experience. The marine life was so diverse and colorful, and the guides were knowledgeable and made the dive safe and enjoyable. I would highly recommend this excursion to anyone who loves the ocean and wants to experience its beauty up close.

I recently went on a North West Passage and it was an amazing experience. The countryside was beautiful and the local people were so friendly and welcoming. The biking was challenging at times, but the sense of accomplishment after completing each day's ride was worth it. I would highly recommend this excursion to anyone who loves biking and wants to experience a different culture.

I recently went on an Iceland Trip and it was an amazing experience. The water was crystal clear and the marine life was so colorful and diverse. The guides were knowledgeable and made the experience even more enjoyable. I would highly recommend this excursion to anyone who loves the ocean and wants to experience its beauty up close.

I recently went on a biking trip through Iceland and it was an amazing experience. The countryside was beautiful and the local people were so friendly and welcoming. The biking was challenging at times, but the sense of accomplishment after completing each day's ride was worth it. I would highly recommend this excursion to anyone who loves biking and wants to experience a different culture.
